control.name: Generic_Onboarding
control.description: Existing onboarding flow with generic content and feature highlights not personalized to user behavior or profile.

treatment.name: Personalized_Onboarding
treatment.description: Onboarding flow wizard that adapts onboarding content and feature highlights based on early user behavior signals and profile inputs.

control.name: Generic_Onboarding
control.description: Current one-size-fits-all onboarding tutorial presented immediately after sign-up.

treatment.name: Adaptive_Onboarding
treatment.description: Streamlined onboarding flow dynamically tailored based on quick user preference inputs collected right after sign-up, showing relevant features and tips.
